author: jpata
body:
Reverts https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/6562, as a possible attempt at a fix to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/32756.

I open this PR to get the jenkins results right now. This could be a backup option for the release managers in case technical improvements to bring the memory under limits do not converge.
title: Revert RecoHGCal-TICL
